paramInformation.label: Application Retries
paramInformation.description: Number of application level retries attempted for messages either not ACKed or messages encapsulated via supervision get that did not receive a report.

paramInformation.label: Application Retry Wait Time
paramInformation.description: The number base seconds used in the calculation for sleeping between retry messages.

paramInformation.label: LED Indicator Behavior
paramInformation.description: Allows LED indications on the device to be turned on or off.

paramInformation.label: Supervisory Report Timeout
paramInformation.description: The number of milliseconds waiting for a Supervisory Report response to a Supervisory Get encapsulated command from the sensor before attempting a retry.
